nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.common

Interface Persistence

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FakePersistence, Persistence_Impl

    public interface Persistence
    Persistence Interface. The persistence interface is used by the application to + load games + save games JSON Object is also included for testing and debugging purposes
